addNetworks.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛliw Fara Bɔrɔsiɲɛbara Kan
addNetworks.description: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli dɔ digi ka a fara MetaMask, Rabby, walima Web3 bɔrɔsiɲɛbara wɛrɛw kan

addNetwork.alreadyPending: Deli bɛ sinsinni na ka kɛ. I ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara lajɛ.
addNetwork.error: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli fara ma ɲɛ. A fara ni bolo ye.

networkWarning.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Tiɲɛnen
networkWarning.message: Token yɛlɛma bɛ sɔrɔ BSC dɔrɔn kan. I ka yɛlɛma ka taa BSC ka i ka token kɔrɔw yɛlɛma.

confirmModal.title: Yɛlɛma Dajɛ
confirmModal.warning: I bɛna i ka tokenw yɛlɛma. I ka nɛɛ kalan ɲuman na ka sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ.
confirmModal.irreversible: Nin baara tɛ se ka sɛgin!
confirmModal.burnExplanation: I ka {{legacySymbol}} tokenw bɛna jɛni abada ani {{newSymbol}} token hakɛ kelen bɛna dilan i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kɔnɔ. Nin tɛ se ka sɛgin.
confirmModal.positiveNote: A ɲuman: {{newSymbol}} sara tɛ pewu — 10%+ sara tɛ baara si la tun.

finalConfirmModal.title: I Dalen B'a La Tiɲɛ Na?
finalConfirmModal.message: Nin ye i ka laban waati ye ka bali. N'i ye dajɛ, i ka {{legacySymbol}} bɛna yɛlɛma ka kɛ {{newSymbol}} ye ani a tɛ se ka sɛgin.

bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Token minw bɛ se ka jago tɛ yen
bridge.addTokenError: Token ma se ka fara bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kan
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Baara tɔgɔla maralen bɛ nin minɛn kɔnɔ

settings.title: Labɛnni
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: RPC URL kura min bɛ kɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye sigida sugandilen na.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli si ma labɛn nin sigida kɔnɔ.

banner.title: I fɔlɔ ye yan wa?
banner.message: A dɔn Freedom Bridge kan ani cogo min na i bɛ se ka TigerOG tokenw jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ.
banner.note: A dɔn: Token yɛlɛma ye tɛmɛnen ye, a tɛ se ka sɛgin.

hero.title: I Ka <1/> <2>Nafenfɛnw</2> Hɔrɔnya
hero.subtitle: TigerOG tokenw jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ ni Axelar Interchain Token Service ye. Kɔrɔlen, teliman, sara tɛ a la.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge bɛ Axelar ITS ta ka jago lafiya, kɔrɔlen, ani sara tɛ a la di {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ.

stopDecay.title: Tiɲɛni Lɔ
stopDecay.description: Token kɔrɔw bɛ 10-11% jɛni i ka nafa la san ni feere bɛɛ la. Yɛlɛma ka taa TigerOG bɛ nin joli lɔ joona, ka i ka nafa 100% mara.

conversion.title: 1:1 Yɛlɛma
conversion.description: Hakɛ bɛɛ tɛ yɛlɛma abada. Tokenw bɛ mara yɛlɛma ladan kɔrɔlen kɔnɔ, ani 1:1 ɲɔgɔnye bɛ kɛ. Yiriwali tɛ, jɛya tɛ.

multichain.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Caman
multichain.description: Bila siɲɛ kelen, sɔrɔ yɔrɔ bɛɛ. I ka nafenfɛn bɛ kɛ interchain token ye sɛgɛsɛgɛliw bɛɛ kan, Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, ani wɛrɛw bɛ a la.

security.title: Axelar Kɔrɔlen
security.description: Axelar ka sɛgɛsɛgɛbaga jama tɛ cɛmancɛ bɛ a baara. ITS b'a lajɛ ko i ka tokenw bɛ jago ni kɔrɔlen ani tɛmɛnisɛbɛn ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛɛ kan.

cta.title: I labɛnna ka jago wa?
cta.description: Fara interchain yɛlɛmali kan. A bɛ miniti kelen dɔrɔn ta ka i ka tokenw yɛlɛma ani ka jago daminɛ ni Axelar ye.

buyTokens.title: Nafenfɛnw Sɔrɔ
buyTokens.description: I ka tokenw tɛ yen fɔlɔ wa? Token fɔlɔw san PancakeSwap kan, o kɔ i ka olu yɛlɛma ka kɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli-caman sugya kura ye.

liveStats.title: Token Kibaruw
liveStats.description: Kibaruw blockchain kan min bɛ yɛlɛmani ni jɛnsenni jira chainw kan.
liveStats.liquidityDescription: Sanni ni feere yɔrɔw DEX kan

header.title: Sɛbɛn
header.subtitle: A dɔn token kɔrɔw yɛlɛma cogo ani jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ.

whatIs.title: Mun Ye Freedom Bridge Ye?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge ye jago sariya ye min dilanna Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) kan. A b'a to i bɛ token kɔrɔw yɛlɛma ka kɛ nafenfɛnw ye minw sara tɛ ani minw bɛ se ka taa lafiya la sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔlenw bɛɛ kan.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Token kɔrɔw teli ka 10%+ sara ta. TigerOG tokenw bɛ 0% sara ta.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Nafenfɛnw taa joona {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ ni Axelar ye.

howToConvert.title: Tokenw Yɛlɛma Cogo
howToConvert.step1: I ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara fara bɔyɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan (misali, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Token kɔrɔ sugandi i b'a fɛ ka min yɛlɛma.
howToConvert.step4: Yɛlɛma ladan sɔn ka i ka tokenw fite.
howToConvert.step5: Digi Yɛlɛma kan ka i ka token kɔrɔw bila ani ka "TigerOG" token hakɛ kelen sɔrɔ.
howToConvert.note: A dɔn: Yɛlɛma bɛ token kɔrɔ sara ta (yɛlɛma tuma) n'i ka token bɛ sara ta taali la. Nka, ni TigerOG sɔrɔla, taali ni jago bɛɛ minw bɛ na o kɔ, sara tɛ olu la.

supportedNetworks.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Sɔrɔlenw
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge bɛ {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔ min bɛ yiriwali la, ka baara lafiya di EVM sigida kɔnɔ ni Axelar ye.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokenw
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) b'a to tokenw bɛ se ka bila sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman kan ni adirɛsi kelen ani hakɛ mara kelen ye. Freedom Bridge bɛ ITS ta ka a lajɛ ko TigerOG bɛ to nafenfɛn tiɲɛ ye a jagolen yɔrɔ bɛɛ.

axelar.title: Axelar Sɛgɛsɛgɛli
axelar.content: An bɛ Axelar ta an ka baara-cɛ tɔn ye. Axelar ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye min tɛ cɛmancɛ, a bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli suguya caman fara ɲɔgɔn na, ka cira kɔrɔlen ni nafenfɛn taali di sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ. Axelar ka kɔrɔlen cogoya bɛ la sɛgɛsɛgɛbaga jama kan minw yamaruya tɛ, ka kɔrɔlen gɛlɛn di interchain tokenw ma.

conversion.title: Yɛlɛma Cogoya
conversion.content: Yɛlɛma ladan bɛ BSC kan. N'i bɛ yɛlɛma, i ka token kɔrɔw bɛ ci adirɛsi safunen ma (u bɛ jɛni abada) ani i bɛ TigerOG sɔrɔ 1:1 la. Nin ye sira kelen baara ye — token kɔrɔw bɛ tiɲɛ ani u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ abada.

security.title: Kɔrɔlen Cogoya
security.content: Kɔrɔlen bɛ Freedom Bridge tɔn bɛɛ kɔnɔ:
security.point1: Yɛlɛma Lɔcogo: Token kɔrɔw bɛ jɛni abada ni ladan hakilima sɛgɛsɛgɛlen minw tɛ yɛlɛma ye.
security.point2: Axelar Sɛgɛsɛgɛbagaw: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ ciraw bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni Axelar sɛgɛsɛgɛli tɛ cɛmancɛ ye.
security.point3: Hakɛ Kelen: ITS bɛ dilan ni jɛni mara ka hakɛ bɛɛ kelen to sɛgɛsɛgɛliw bɛɛ kan.
security.point4: Ladan Sɛgɛsɛgɛlen: Dilanna Axelar ni OpenZeppelin sariya tɔn kan.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Hakɛ jatedenw bɛɛ bɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Hakɛ Jateden
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG hakɛ maralen bɛ bɔ BNBTiger token fɔlɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta kɔnɔ.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada ani u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBTiger sara sira fɛ.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBTiger ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ ani u bɔra jago la.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBTiger tokenw mara ni BNB ye. Ni LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 86.18% LP token bɛɛ la
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 86.18% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
tigerogSupply.note: A dɔn: TigerOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBTiger ye yɛlɛma tuma. TigerOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBTiger hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBTiger token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Hakɛ Jateden
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG hakɛ maralen bɛ bɔ BNBLion token fɔlɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta kɔnɔ.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada ani u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBLion sara sira fɛ.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBLion ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ ani u bɔra jago la.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBLion tokenw mara ni BNB ye. Ni LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 99.98% LP token bɛɛ la
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 99.98% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
lionogSupply.note: A dɔn: LionOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBLion ye yɛlɛma tuma. LionOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBLion hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
lionogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBLion token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

frogogSupply.title: FrogOG Hakɛ Jateden
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG hakɛ maralen bɛ bɔ BNBFrog token fɔlɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta kɔnɔ.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada ani u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBFrog sara sira fɛ.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBFrog ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ ani u bɔra jago la.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBFrog tokenw mara ni BNB ye. Ni LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 99.31% LP token bɛɛ la
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 99.31% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
frogogSupply.note: A dɔn: FrogOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBFrog ye yɛlɛma tuma. FrogOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBFrog hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
frogogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBFrog token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

contracts.title: Ladan Adirɛsiw

header.title: Ladan Hakilimaw
header.subtitle: Bila adirɛsi tiɲɛnenw tokenw ni jagow kama Freedom Bridge kɔnɔ.

interchainTokens.title: Interchain Tokenw
interchainTokens.description: Interchain tokenw minw bilara ni Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ye. Nin tokenw bɛ adirɛsi kelen mara sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔlenw bɛɛ kan.

axelarNetwork.title: Axelar Sɛgɛsɛgɛli
axelarNetwork.description: Cira sariya min bɛ jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ kɔrɔ ani ka jateden tiɲɛya lajɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ.

conversionContracts.title: Yɛlɛma Ladanw
conversionContracts.description: Minw bɛ token kɔrɔw yɛlɛma ka kɛ interchain nafenfɛnw ye. Nin ladanw bɛ bila ni dilan cogoya mara bɔyɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan.

conversionContractsTable.title: Yɛlɛma Ladan Adirɛsiw
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Nin ladanw BSC kan bɛ yɛlɛma mara ka bɔ token kɔrɔw la ka taa interchain tokenw la.

liquidityPools.title: Wari Yɔrɔw
liquidityPools.description: DEX wari yɔrɔw i bɛ se ka OG tokenw jago sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman kan.

liquidityPoolsTable.title: Wari Yɔrɔw
liquidityPoolsTable.subtitle: DEX yɔrɔw OG token jago kama

contracts.interchainAsset: Interchain Nafenfɛn ni Axelar ITS ye

faq.title: Freedom Bridge Dɛmɛ
faq.subtitle: Jaabi TigerOG, jago, ani Axelar ɲininiw kan.

cta.title: I ka ɲininiw bɛ yen halisa?
cta.description: Fara an ka jama kan Telegram kan walima Wiki lajɛ ka baara ɲɛfɔli sɔrɔ.

questions.q1: Mun ye n ka tokenw yɛlɛma kun ye?
questions.a1: I ka tokenw yɛlɛma ka kɛ TigerOG ye bɛ baara sara bɔ (teli ka kɛ 10-12%) token kɔrɔ la. A b'a to fana i bɛ se ka nin tokenw jago ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛw la i n'a fɔ Ethereum, Base, ani wɛrɛw ni Axelar ye, ka yɔrɔ kura sɔrɔ.
questions.q2: Freedom Bridge baara ka lafiya wa?
questions.a2: Awɔ. Sariya bɛ yɛlɛma ladan kɔrɔlen ni Axelar Interchain Token Service ta. N'i bɛ yɛlɛma, i ka BNBTiger bɛ jɛni abada ani i bɛ TigerOG sɔrɔ 1:1 la. Jɛni cogoya b'a lajɛ ko hakɛ bɛɛ bɛ mara ɲuman na sɛgɛsɛgɛliw bɛɛ kan.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge yɛrɛ tɛ sara ta yɛlɛma la. I bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli gazi sara dɔrɔn sara. Jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ gazi sara ta min bɛ sara Axelar ma ka cira saraw ta.
questions.q4: Mun bɛ kɛ n'i ye n ka tokenw tunun?
questions.a4: TigerOG tokenw bɛ kɛ i n'a fɔ ERC20 token wɛrɛ bɛɛ. N'i ye i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara sira tunun, u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ. I ka kɔnɔna kilew ni sɔrɔ daɲɛw mara tuma bɛɛ.
questions.q5: N bɛ se ka n ka TigerOG tokenw sɛgin BNBTiger ma wa?
questions.a5: Ayi. Yɛlɛma ye sira kelen ye. N'i ye BNBTiger yɛlɛma ka kɛ TigerOG ye, i ka token kɔrɔw bɛ jɛni abada (u bɛ ci adirɛsi safunen ma). Nin ye kun ye — TigerOG ye sugya kura ye min sara tɛ, a dilanna ka token kɔrɔ nɔ ta pewu.
questions.a6: An bɛ EVM sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman sɔrɔ ni Axelar ye, BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, ani wɛrɛw bɛ a la. Wiki lajɛ ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔlenw bɛɛ ye.
questions.a7:
Jago teliya bɛ bɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli min i bɛ CI la kan:

• Ethereum: miniti 15-20 (sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman mago bɛ a la)
• BSC ni Avalanche: miniti 2-4 (teliman)
• Base, Linea, Polygon: miniti 3-5

App bɛ waati jatenya jira ka sɔrɔ ka jago.
questions.q8: OG tokenw hakɛ jumɛn bɛ yen?
questions.a8:
OG token kelen-kelen bɛɛ hakɛ maralen bɛ bɔ a ka BNB token fɔlɔ la, ka token jɛninenw, ladan kɔnɔna wari, ani LP maralenw ta:

• TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% fɔlɔ la)
• LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% fɔlɔ la)
• FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% fɔlɔ la)

Wiki lajɛ ka ɲɛfɔli bɛɛ ye.
questions.q9: Mun na OG ladan ma bɔ bolo la (renounce)?
questions.a9: Ladan bɔli bolo la bɛna se bɔ ka yiriwali kɛ ani ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kuraw fara. Hali ni ladan tɛna bɔ bolo la waati min bɛ se ka ye, bolo caman mago bɛ a la ka yɛlɛma si kɛ. Wa, token ni sara si ma di jɛkulu ma.
questions.q10: Mun na OG ladan bɛ se ka dilan (mint)?
questions.a10: Jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ mago bɛ dilan/jɛni baara la — tokenw bɛ jɛni ni u bɛ bɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli la, u bɛ dilan ni u bɛ se. Nin b'a to hakɛ bɛɛ bɛ to kelen sɛgɛsɛgɛliw bɛɛ kan. Dilan bɛ kontrol ni multisig Safe bɔrɔsiɲɛbara ye.
questions.q11: TigerOG bɛ BNB Chain to ka taa Axelar ma wa?
questions.a11: Ayi. Axelar tɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye — a ye jago sariya ye min bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛliw fara ɲɔgɔn na. BNB Chain bɛ to bɔyɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye i bɛ token kɔrɔw yɛlɛma yɔrɔ min na. Axelar dɔrɔn b'a to i ka tokenw bɛ se ka taa BNB, Ethereum, Base, ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔlen wɛrɛw cɛ.
questions.a12: A lajɛ ko i ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli ni token adirɛsi fara i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kan. I bɛ se ka ladan adirɛsi bɛɛ sɔrɔ Ladanw ɲɛ kan. Tiger jɛkulu bɛ Rabby bɔrɔsiɲɛbara ta min b'a to sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman mara ka nɔgɔya.
questions.q13: Mun na jago ka bɔ Ethereum walima Base bɛ mɛɛn kojugu?
questions.a13: Ethereum mago bɛ waati fila la ka sɔrɔ ka baara laban ka lafiya gɛlɛn sɔrɔ. Komi Base bɛ laban Ethereum kan, a bɛ nin mɛɛnni ta. Nin bɛ lafiya bila teliya ɲɛ — i ka tokenw lafiyalen don, muɲu dɔɔnin.
questions.q14: Mun bɛ kɛ n'i tora n ka token fɔlɔ la ani n ma yɛlɛma?
questions.a14: Gansan tɛ yɛlɛma la. BNBTiger ni TigerOG bɛna wari yɔrɔ suguya, dɔgɔkun nafa, ani wɛrɛw wɛrɛ sɔrɔ tuma bɛɛ. Nka BNBTiger sara ka gɛlɛn, TigerOG sara tɛ jago la. Komi token kɔrɔ saraw tɛ kɛ ka porozɛ dɛmɛ, yiriwali bɛ kɛ CTO jɛkulu fɛ TigerOG ye. Freedom Bridge ni sɛgɛsɛgɛli-caman ye TigerOG dɔrɔn ye.
questions.q15: Sara bɛ yɛlɛma la wa? TigerOG sara bɛ yen wa?
questions.a15: Ayi. Gazi sara bɛɲuman dɔrɔn bɛ yɛlɛma ni jago la. Sara wɛrɛ si tɛ, ani TigerOG ye ladan ye min sara tɛ.
questions.q16: N bɛ se ka TigerOG san ani jago kɛ a la directeman wa?
questions.a16: Fɔlɔ tɛ. Jɛkulu ma sara ni saraw lajɛ ka se ka wari yɔrɔ belebele di. Ka TigerOG sɔrɔ sisan, i ka kan ka fɔlɔ san walima ka a sɔrɔ ka sɔrɔ ani ka yɛlɛma. N'i ye TigerOG sɔrɔ, a jago tɛna nɔgɔya fo warijɛlaw bɛ na ka fara wari yɔrɔ kan.
questions.q17: Mun na TigerOG dɔgɔkun nafa bɛ iko a ka bɛ kojugu?
questions.a17: Wari yɔrɔ ka dɔgɔ kɛra, jago dɔɔnin si bɛ ɲɛ dɔgɔkun nafa jiralen kan. Nin bɛ ɲɛ ni warijɛlaw nana ka kɛ wari yɔrɔ dibagaw ye.
questions.a18: Freedom Bridge ma tɛmɛ kɔrɔlen sɛgɛsɛgɛli tiɲɛnen fɛ. Nka, yɛlɛma ladan koodi bɛ la SHx yɛlɛma kan min dilanna Stronghold jɛkulu fɛ (XRP ni Stellar dilanbaga kɔrɔw minw ye baara jira Davos la). Jago sɔgɔma bɛ Axelar baara min ye kɔrɔlen sɛgɛsɛgɛli caman tɛmɛ.
questions.q19: Freedom Bridge bɛ tanga cogo di hack walima exploit ma?
questions.a19:
Cogoya caman bɛ yen:

• Yɛlɛma ladan bɛ hakɛ tiɲɛ dɔrɔn mara — token caman tɛ yen minw bɛ se ka exploit
• Yɛlɛma ladan tɛ dilan yamaruya sɔrɔ
• Ladan koodi bɛɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛlen don sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan ani a yɛrɛ ye kɔnɔbɔ ye
• Token yamaru bɛ mara Safe.global multisig bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kɔnɔ
• Jago bɛ Axelar sɔgɔma sɛgɛsɛgɛlen fɛ
questions.q20: Jago tɛ se ka sɛgin wa? Mun bɛ kɛ ni taali tiɲɛna?
questions.a20: Jago taaliw bɛ se ka lɔ gazi dɛsɛ walima sɛgɛsɛgɛli faralen kosɔn. Ni nin kɛra, i bɛ se ka i ka baara sɛgɛsɛgɛ Axelarscan kan ani ka gazi fara ni bolo ye ka a laban. Axelar bɛ baara sɔrɔli minɛnw di — i tɛna i ka tokenw tunun.
questions.q21: Farati jumaw bɛ Freedom Bridge baara la?
questions.a21: I n'a fɔ DeFi sariya bɛɛ, farati bɛ yen i n'a fɔ ladan hakilima farati, jago farati, ani sɔrɔyɔrɔ yɛlɛma. An b'a fɔ i ka i yɛrɛ ka ɲinini kɛ (DYOR) ani ka wari ta i bɛ se ka min tunun dɔrɔn. An ka sariya lajɛ ka kunnafoni caman sɔrɔ.
questions.q22: N bɛ se ka BNB Tiger Inu ladan kura (Sɛtanburu 2025) yɛlɛma wa?
questions.a22: Ayi. Freedom Bridge bɛ BNB Tiger token fɔlɔ/kɔrɔ dɛmɛ min daminɛna san caman tɛmɛnen — a tɛ ladan kura ye min dilanna Sɛtanburu 2025 la. Freedom Bridge dilanna jama ka sɔrɔ (CTO) Tiger, Lion, ani Frog token fɔlɔw kama.
questions.a23: Wari yɔrɔ farali ye DeFi baara gɛlɛn ye farati bɛ a la. N'i bɛ wari yɔrɔ di DEXw kan i n'a fɔ PancakeSwap walima Uniswap, cogoya ye kelen ye — OG token fara nafenfɛn fɔlɔ kan. Video ɲuman bɛ yan wari yɔrɔ kan n'i b'a fɛ ka dɔn a la ka ɲɛ: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiylIHvwMik&list=PL_ujg_v1hZ5iGtiuhT8NkSMqEOaLAgmUu
questions.q24: Jɛkulu bɛ se ka rug pull kɛ wa?
questions.a24: Ayi. Sira si tɛ yen rug pull kama. Token ni sara si ma di jɛkulu ma, an tɛ jago sara si lajɛ — olu bɛ taa Axelar ma cira saraw kama. Jɛkulu ye tokenw tigɛlaw ye i n'a fɔ aw, an bɛ nin dila an yɛrɛ ka sara kan. Jɛkulu ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kelen min bɛ yen ye marketing bɔrɔsiɲɛbara ye min bɛ ɲɛ la, jama bolomafara bɛ a fa. Multisig Safe bɔrɔsiɲɛbara bɛ ladan yamaru kontrol i n'a fɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli ci lɔli gansan tuma, nka a tɛ se ka baarakɛlaw ka wari sɔrɔ walima ka a yɛlɛma.

disclaimer.title: Sariya Kunnafoni
disclaimer.subtitle: I ka nin kalan ɲuman na ka sɔrɔ ka Freedom Bridge baara.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: Warijɛ Ladili Tɛ
noInvestmentAdvice.content: Kunnafoni min bɛ Freedom Bridge la tɛ warijɛ, wari, jago, walima ladili wɛrɛ si ye. I ka kan ka kunnafoni si ta ten. Freedom Bridge tɛ a fɔ ko cryptocurrency si ka kan ka san, feere, walima mara. I yɛrɛ ka ɲinini kɛ ani i ka wari ladilibaga ɲininka ka sɔrɔ ka warijɛ si kɛ.

risksOfUse.title: Baara Farati
risksOfUse.content:
Cryptocurrency sɔrɔyɔrɔw bɛ yɛlɛma ani u tɛ se ka dɔn. Ka Freedom Bridge baara, i b'a dajɛ ko:

• Ladan hakilimaw bɛ se ka fili walima dɛsɛ sɔrɔ minw bɛ se ka wari tunun
• Jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ farati bɛ a la i n'a fɔ: oracle tiɲɛni, sɛgɛsɛgɛbaga jɛɲɔgɔnya, ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli farali
• Token nafaw bɛ se ka yɛlɛma kojugu ani i bɛ se ka i ka wari dɔ walima a bɛɛ tunun
• Sɛgɛsɛgɛli baara tɛ se ka sɛgin
• Sɛgɛsɛgɛli saraw ni gazi saraw tɛ an ka kontrol la

noWarranties.title: Taamasiyɛn Tɛ
noWarranties.content: Freedom Bridge bɛ di "a bɛ cogo min na" taamasiyɛn si tɛ a la. An tɛ taamasiyɛn di ko baara tɛna lɔ, a ka lafiya, walima fili tɛ a la. An tɛ taamasiyɛn di kunnafoni tiɲɛya, danmaya, walima dafalen kan.

limitationOfLiability.title: Jalaki Dantigɛli
limitationOfLiability.content: Ka sariya se dafa, Freedom Bridge, a dilanbagaw, dɛmɛbagaw, ani u ɲɔgɔnw tɛna jalaki ta tiɲɛni si la min bɛ bɔ i ka baara la, nafa tununi, jateden tununi, walima cryptocurrency nafenfɛn tununi bɛ a la.

thirdPartyServices.title: Mɔgɔ Wɛrɛ Baaraw
thirdPartyServices.content: Freedom Bridge bɛ baara ni mɔgɔ wɛrɛ baaraw ye i n'a fɔ Axelar Network jago kama. An tɛ jalaki ta nin mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka baara, kunnafoni, walima jateden la. I ka nin baaraw ta u ka sariyaw kɔnɔ.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Sariya Bɛɲɔgɔnya
regulatoryCompliance.content: Cryptocurrency sariyaw bɛ wɛrɛ wɛrɛ yɔrɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ la. I kelen bɛ jalaki ta ka a lajɛ ko i ka Freedom Bridge baara bɛ bɛn sariya bɛɛ ma i ka yɔrɔ la. Freedom Bridge tɛ kuma fɔ baara sariyama kan yɔrɔ si la.

dyor.title: I Yɛrɛ Ka Ɲinini Kɛ
dyor.content: I yɛrɛ ka ɲinini kɛ (DYOR) tuma bɛɛ ka sɔrɔ ka DeFi sariya si baara. Ladan adirɛsiw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, token cogoya faamu, ani wari fara i bɛ se ka min tunun dɔrɔn.

disclaimer.acknowledgment: Ka Freedom Bridge baara, i b'a dajɛ ko i ye nin sariya kunnafoni kalan, faamu, ani sɔn.

disclaimerModal.title: Sariya Kunnafoni Nafama
disclaimerModal.subtitle: I ka kalan ani dajɛ ka sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ.
disclaimerModal.noAdvice: Freedom Bridge tɛ warijɛ, wari, walima jago ladili di. Cryptocurrency warijɛw bɛ yɛlɛma ani farati bɛ a la.
disclaimerModal.risks: Ka nin baara, i b'a dajɛ ko ladan hakilimaw bɛ se ka dɛsɛ sɔrɔ, jago sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ farati bɛ a la, ani baara tɛ se ka sɛgin.
disclaimerModal.dyor: I yɛrɛ ka ɲinini kɛ (DYOR) tuma bɛɛ ani wari ta i bɛ se ka min tunun dɔrɔn.
disclaimerModal.fullDisclaimer: Ka kunnafoni bɛɛ sɔrɔ, an ka lajɛ
disclaimerModal.accept: N Ye A Faamu ani N Sɔnna

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli yɛlɛma tiɲɛna. A yɛlɛma ni bolo ye i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kɔnɔ.
common.unableToDetermineGas: Axelar gazi sara tɛ se ka ɲɛfɔ
